Author: thoughtfulfox
Text: Showering is a problem for me as well. Right now, I’m doing my best to just close my eyes and/or tilt my head back.   If I could relapse into my restrictive tendencies, I probably would...but my ED never feels like it cooperates. I know if I try to restrict, I’ll just binge myself into oblivion and gain more weight.   I’m sorry you’re going through this too. I know my body needed to gain some weight, but damn, why couldn’t the binging have stopped 10 pounds ago.

Author: SkeletalDesire
Text: I'm currently in a similar place. I went into recovery and gained about 20lbs. Even showering naked feels devastating. I'm trying to avoid relapse but... may be too late at this point
